name: NEEDOLGOST
description:
NEEDOLGOST is an old-school throwback to QUAKE II  grapplehook  deathmatches.
You play as a rough and tough battle maiden swooping through the air and dispensing fiery death upon your opponent.
It is also my first completed game using internet multiplayer systems and I'm relatively pleased with myself in what has been achieved in one week. 

Please leave comments and be brutally honest (+offer advice if you like)

NOTE: There is no winning score. I ran out of time to build proper game rules... so just play with some house rules.

To start a game with your buddies.
Launch Game...
Enter PLAYER NAME and enter ROOM NAME
JOIN ROOM to start, or join an existing room by the same name.

MOVEMENT : WASD

JUMP : SPACE

AIM : MOUSE

FIRE : Left Mouse Button [HOLD to auto fire]

HARPOON : Right mouse button... [HOLD to launch and release to let go]
